com.camerontec.util.test

Class JUnitUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.test.JUnitUtils

  • public class JUnitUtils
extends Object
    This class contains utility methods used in tests.
    Author:
    Guillaume Jacob (guillaume.jacob@orcsoftware.com)

      • assertCallFails

        @SafeVarargs
public static void assertCallFails(Callable<?> callable,
                                                String expectedExceptionMessage,
                                                Class<? extends Throwable> expectedExceptionClass,
                                                Class<? extends Throwable>... expectedExceptionCauses)
        Tests that the execution of the given Callable fails with an exception of the right type and with the right message.
        Parameters:
        callable - the Callable to execute
        expectedExceptionMessage - should be contained in the message of the expected exception. Ignored if null
        expectedExceptionClass - the class of the expected exception
        expectedExceptionCauses - the classes of the expected exception's causes. There must be at least as many causes as there are classes provided in this parameter

      • assertCallFails

        @SafeVarargs
public static void assertCallFails(Runnable runnable,
                                                String expectedExceptionMessage,
                                                Class<? extends Throwable> expectedExceptionClass,
                                                Class<? extends Throwable>... expectedExceptionCauses)
        Tests that the execution of the given Runnable fails with an exception of the right type and with the right message.
        Parameters:
        runnable - the Runnable to execute
        expectedExceptionMessage - should be contained in the message of the expected exception. Ignored if null
        expectedExceptionClass - the class of the expected exception
        expectedExceptionCauses - the classes of the expected exception's causes. There must be at least as many causes as there are classes provided in this parameter

      • setenv

        public static Map<String,String> setenv(Map<String,String> env)
        Replaces current environment variables. All currently defined environment variables are deleted prior to setting new variables as per the given map.
        Parameters:
        env - the new map of environment variables
        Returns:
        the current map of environment variables
